withpkgdown: An Example Package

This package’s purpose is to show how to use litr to create a package with a README, a vignette, a pkgdown site, and (of course) a hex sticker. We can see the result of all of that at this package’s website here.

Getting started

Put instructions here for how to install your package:

# [change "jacobbien" to your github username]
# remotes::install_github("jacobbien/withpkgdown-project", subdir = "withpkgdown")
